text: phra xngkh khux xallxhˌ sung mimi phracea xun dı xik nxkcak phraxngkh phuthrng xanac sungsud phuthrng brisuththi phuthrng khwam santi sukh phuthrng khumkhrxng kar sraththa phuthrng pkpakraksʹa khwam plxdphay phuthrng khwam ying hıy phumicı mha brisuththi dæ xallxhˌ hı phn cak sing thi phwk khea tang phakhi tx phraxngkh
